name: @calliopadev/calliopadev
description: Create a clean software system architecture with TypeScript

scripts.templated: nunjucks --path ./private/templated --out . --extension yaml pnpm-workspace.yaml ./private/source-data.json && nunjucks --path ./private/templated --out . --extension json package.json ./private/source-data.json
scripts.dev: trap 'echo Stop CalliopaDev Gracefully; turbo run stopdev --no-cache --force; echo CalliopaDev Stopped ;exit 0' EXIT; turbo run dev --concurrency=30
scripts.uat: trap 'echo Stop CalliopaUAT Gracefully; turbo run stopuat --no-cache --force; echo CalliopaUAT Stopped ;exit 0' EXIT; turbo run uat --concurrency=30
